rules_text: Consume 2.5 Red -> Deal 1 damage, apply 1 POISON
Consume 2 Red -> Deal 1 damage, SLOW target 3 ticks
Consume 2 MOMENTUM -> Next 3 cards cost -1 tick
Consume 2.5 Red -> Apply BURN 3 to target

rules_text.Every 6 Ticks: Deal 1 damage per row with SPARK

rules_text: Consume 2 HEAT -> Deal 3 damage to all
Consume 2 MOMENTUM -> Trigger all Red gears
Consume 5 Red -> Deal 2 damage to all
Consume 7 Red -> Deal 4 damage to all
Consume 2 Red -> Deal 1 damage, SLOW target
Consume 3 Blue -> All draw effects trigger
Consume 5 Green -> Deal 3 damage to all
Consume 1 ENTROPY -> Apply 2 POISON to all
Consume 5 Black -> Deal 2 damage to all
Apply 1 POISON to all each tick
STONE cards produce +1 of their resource

rules_text.Every 4 Ticks: Produce 3 Blue, MECH cards tick 1 faster

rules_text: Consume 2 Blue -> Deal 1 damage per CRYSTAL

Consume 2 PRECISION -> Deal 4 damage, all MECH HASTE 20%

rules_text: TOOL cards can activate twice when they fire
ARCANE cards gain all keyword bonuses
